headline: Built with you, not just for you.

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.description: We start with diagnosis. We discuss your current situation, pain points, and timeline—then recommend the right approach and next steps.
steps.requirement: Honest assessment of current pain points, timeline expectations

steps.title: Proposal & Planning
steps.description: You receive a detailed proposal: deliverables, timeline, pricing, what we need from you. Clear scope boundaries, what's included and what's not.
steps.requirement: Review proposal, approve scope and initial deposit to begin

steps.title: Build & Collaboration
steps.description: We build in focused phases. You review in progress, not just at the end. We adapt to feedback without scope creep. Change requests are discussed openly, not buried.
steps.requirement: Timely feedback and access to your current tools

visual.title: Sprint 1 Review
visual.commentText: The new layout looks great! Just need to tweak the mobile padding.

steps.title: Launch & Handoff
steps.description: We deploy, test, and train your team. You receive complete documentation, architecture overview, and support guidelines. We ensure you're confident running the system.
steps.requirement: Final approval and remaining payment. We train your team before handoff.

philosophyStatement: We build proportional infrastructure that works from day one and scales when you're ready.
